help.title: Equation Help:
help.description: Use 't' for time (seconds) and 'Duration' for section duration (seconds). Standard Math functions are available (e.g., sin(t), cos(t), exp(t), abs(t)). Output is clamped to 0-255.

equation.sectionRequired: At least one equation section is required in Red, Green, or Blue channels.

timestamp.integer: Timestamps must be integers representing milliseconds.
timestamp.unique: Each change event must use a unique millisecond timestamp.

simple.hexColor: Colors must be provided as 6-digit hexadecimal values such as #ffaa00.
simple.changeEventRequired: At least one change event is required for a pattern.
simple.stepDurationZero: Step {{step}} has a duration of 0ms. All steps must have a positive duration.

duration.integer: Duration must be a whole number in milliseconds.
duration.min: Duration must be greater than zero.

accel.triggerRequired: At least one accelerometer trigger is required when accel is present.
accel.componentRequired: Accelerometer triggers must configure at least one LED component.

mode.patternRequired: At least one pattern (Front or Case) is required.
